onCreateView(android.view.ViewGroup).Description: Create a View for the Logo, default implementation loads from @B_android#support#v17#leanback#R#layout#lb_fullwidth_details_overview_logo_E@. Subclass may override this method to use a fixed layout size and change ImageView scaleType. If the layout params is WRAP_CONTENT for both width and size, the ViewHolder would be using intrinsic size of Drawable in @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#DetailsOverviewLogoPresenter#onBindViewHolder_E@.

ClassDesc: Presenter that responsible to create a ImageView and bind to DetailsOverviewRow. The default implementation uses @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#DetailsOverviewRow#getImageDrawable_E@ and binds to https:##developer#android#com@B_android#widget#ImageView_E@. Default implementation assumes no scaleType on ImageView and uses intrinsic width and height of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#DetailsOverviewRow#getImageDrawable_E@ to initialize ImageView's layout params. To specify a fixed size and/or specify a scapeType, subclass should change ImageView's layout params and scaleType in @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#DetailsOverviewLogoPresenter#onCreateView_E@. Subclass may override and has its own image view. Subclass may also download image from URL instead of using @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#DetailsOverviewRow#getImageDrawable_E@. It's subclass's responsibility to call @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FullWidthDetailsOverviewRowPresenter#notifyOnBindLogo_E@ whenever @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#DetailsOverviewLogoPresenter#isBoundToImage_E@ turned to true so that activity transition can be started.
